The following method has been adopted for calculation of above ratios!-
Current Ratio i Total of current assets / Total of current liabilities.
Debt-Equity Ratio : Debt / Equity.
Oebt Service Coverage Ratio ! EBITDA / Interest on borrowlngs.
Return on Equity Ratio ! Net Profit after Tax / Shareholders' funds.
Inventory turnovea aatio i Turnover / Average Inventory.
I
Trade Râ‚¬ceivables turnover ratio : Turnover / Average Trade Receivables.
Trade payables turnover ratio : Turnover / Average Trade payables.
Net capital turnover ratio : Turnover / Net Capital.
Net profit ratio i Net Profit / Turnover,
Return on Capital employed r Earnings before Interest and Taxes / Capital Employed,i.e., Equity + Debt.
Return on investment ! Net Profit after Tax / Capital Employed,i,e., Equity + Debt
